Title: Singapore Airlines Companion Sale
TermsandConditions: *Conditions Apply. Prices displayed are ‘from' pricing, includes all taxes and fees, except payment card fees which may be payable in addition, rates vary. Prices correct as at 15 April 2016 and are subject to availability. Prices displayed are based on two passengers travelling together on the same itinerary during the following departures dates of 01MAY16-15JUN16, 16JUL16-31JUL16 and 01OCT16-15NOV16 for travel to Europe; 01MAY16-31MAY16, 14JUL16-31AUG16 and 29SEP16-23NOV16 for travel to other destinations. Flight restrictions apply. Airline terms and conditions and helloworld online Booking Terms and Conditions apply.
Body:
Singapore Airlines Companion Sale


Take your friend or family member away with amazing flight deals from Singapore Airlines. With options between Singapore, Paris, London and more, we are sure the perfect flight is here for the two of you. Offer ends 26 April 2016, unless sold out prior.


The following airfare prices are based on two people booking and travelling together.

Title: Hawaiian Airlines USA Sale
TermsandConditions: *Conditions Apply. Prices displayed are ‘from' pricing, includes all taxes and fees, except payment card fees which may be payable in addition, rates vary. Prices correct as at 23 March 2016 and are subject to availability. Prices displayed are based on the following departures dates of 23MAR16-22JUN16, 10JUL16-08SEP16 and 04OCT16-08DEC16 for travel to Hawaii from Brisbane; 23MAR16-29JUN16, 16JUL16-08SEP16 and 04OCT16-08DEC16 for travel to Hawaii from Sydney; 26APR16-20JUN16, 09JUL16-20SEP16 and 16OCT16-12DEC16 for travel to Las Vegas; 23MAR16-16JUN16, 05JUL16-08SEP16 and 04OCT16-08DEC16 for travel to Los Angeles. Flight restrictions apply. Airline terms and conditions and helloworld online Booking Terms and Conditions apply.
Body:
Hawaiian Airlines USA Sale


Now is the time for your Los Angeles getaway. Pack your bags and experience an unforgettable holiday with Hawaiian Airlines. Offer ends 30 April 2016, unless sold out prior.
